about:
Little Webby Press is a _Web Application_ to convert your manuscript into both an eBook and a Website. It helps reduce the friction between writing and publishing, so that you can focus your time and energy into your craft.


You can use it to generate as many books as you want. There is no need for an account because your data never leaves your computer. Since Little Webby Press doesn't rely on expensive to scale servers, it can be offered for free.


Little Webby Press is developed by [Andr√© Alves Garzia](https://andregarzia.com) in London, UK. If you want to support my work, you can [buy me a coffee](https://ko-fi.com/andregarzia).


This version of Little Webby Press is considered an MVP.
drag-and-drop-to-start: Drag & Drop a folder with Manuscript to start.
manuscript-tab-description: The Manuscript tab only lists files listed in Book.toml. The files are listed in the order they'll appear in the book (this is your spine).
options-book-format-blurb: The eBook will be assembled in EPUB3 non-DRM format.
options-ebook-is-disabled: eBook support is disabled in your configuration.
options-website-format-blurb:
The website generated by this tool is a static website that can be
				deployed to any webserver.
options-website-is-disabled: Website support is disabled in your configuration.
